subject: Fw: Re: Order #SSN4233 confirmed
description_text:
Hi Simsonn,

I'm following up on this email as I have had no acknowledgement from Simsonn from my previous email.

I have not received the Simsonn VAM Pro Linear motors and brackets that I purchased a month ago. As below, I did receive the pedals and base plate.

Tracking number ALS01287252350 still shows no update since 8th December and has not been assigned an international tracking number. Can someone reply with information on when I will receive these items please.

Regards,
Scott.
________________________________
From: Sam Jones <sj.register@outlook.co.nz>
Sent: Tuesday, 30 December 2025 9:44 am
To: service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com>
Subject: Re: Re: Order #SSN4233 confirmed

Hi service@simsonn.com,

This morning I received a parcel which contained the Simsonn Plus X pedal set and baseplate. It did not contain the VAM Pro Linear motors and power supply.

The original order email from Simsonn I received with tracking numbers:

[cid:a22413ac-f720-466a-9c2a-445960e264ad]

This is the first tracking number ALS01287279274, which is the parcel that arrived today 2025-12-30.

[cid:f4389ad8-74b7-497a-982f-44242e2667f4]

This is the second tracking number ALS01287252350, and I have not received this, I assume it contains the VAM Pro Linear Motors. The parcel tracking shows it has never left China.

[cid:7e1d25c2-7955-4aba-b1fd-943fdae92012]


  1.
Can I have an update on where this parcel is please.


  1.
Can you also advise when the Simsonn SQ Pro Racing Simulator Sequential Shifter (Extended) will be back in stock please.

Kind regards,
Scott.

________________________________
From: service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com>
Sent: Friday, December 5, 2025 12:52 AM
To: sj.register@outlook.co.nz <sj.register@outlook.co.nz>
Subject: Re: Re: Order #SSN4233 confirmed

Hi Sam Jones,

These items are all included in your order, so please don't worry. Due to high warehouse volume, your order will ship tomorrow. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.



On Thu, 4 Dec at 4:37 AM , Sam Jones <sj.register@outlook.co.nz> wrote:
Hi service@simsonn.com

Thank you for getting back to me. My order should also include the baseplate, but that isn't mentioned in your reply.

Can you confirm that is also being shipped as ordered please.

Regards,
Scott.


________________________________
From: service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 4, 2025 9:25 PM
To: sj.register@outlook.co.nz <sj.register@outlook.co.nz>
Subject: Re: Re: Order #SSN4233 confirmed

Hi Sam Jones,

Yes, your order includes the PlusX three-pedal set, the VAM Pro motor, and the U-shaped bracket.


On Tue, 2 Dec at 3:43 PM , Sam Jones <sj.register@outlook.co.nz> wrote:
Hi Simsonn,

I am unable to login to View ticket via the link below. I don't seem to be able to create an account, the freshdesk.com portion of the website looks broken.

I am wanting to confirm that my order is correct.

Below is a screenshot I took of the order screen as I was placing my order. It clearly shows the 3 Pedals with VAM Haptics, the Baseplate, and the U-Shaped Mounting Brackets for both the Brake and Throttle.

[https://attachment.freshdesk.com/inline/attachment?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpZCI6MTU4MDA0MzIzMjE2LCJkb21haW4iOiJzaW1zb25uLmZyZXNoZGVzay5jb20iLCJhY2NvdW50X2lkIjo0MjA2MDM2fQ.3rYakQuOY0ELwK0JuNEk64EIB4MWcpV-luwxHlwK4D0]

The email I received to confirm order #SSN4233 shows this screenshot below, which has no mention of the baseplate or U-Shaped Mounting Brackets, but does show the price with "black45" discount for all of those items.

[https://attachment.freshdesk.com/inline/attachment?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpZCI6MTU4MDA0MzIzMjE3LCJkb21haW4iOiJzaW1zb25uLmZyZXNoZGVzay5jb20iLCJhY2NvdW50X2lkIjo0MjA2MDM2fQ.sMpekByAXu1hT0RlDmkaRrYbJ5xhgeuaY4H49K3guVA]

Please urgently confirm that my order is:

  *
Newest Simsonn Plus X Simracing Load Cell Pedal with Haptics Reactor Plus X-P3-H3 / Silver (Throttle, Brake, Clutch pedals, Simsonn, 3 x VAM Pro Linear Motors with power supply, and Simsonn Control Box)
  *
Baseplate-17-5: Baseplate
  *
U-Shaped Mounting Bracket for Brake
  *
U-Shaped Mounting Bracket for Throttle

Regards,
Scott.

________________________________
From: service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com>
Sent: Monday, December 1, 2025 10:40 PM
To: sj.register@outlook.co.nz <sj.register@outlook.co.nz>
Subject: Ticket Received - Re: Order #SSN4233 confirmed

Hi Sam Jones
We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a ticket has been created.
A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you a personal response.(usually within 24 hours).

To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit
https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/7146?follow=email

Thank you for your patience.
View ticket<https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/7146?follow=email>
If the button doesn't work, copy-paste this URL in your browser's address bar: https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/7146?follow=email
Regards,
simsonn Support Team

conversations.body_text:
Hi Simsonn,

I am unable to login to View ticket via the link below. I don't seem to be able to create an account, the freshdesk.com portion of the website looks broken.

I am wanting to confirm that my order is correct.

Below is a screenshot I took of the order screen as I was placing my order. It clearly shows the 3 Pedals with VAM Haptics, the Baseplate, and the U-Shaped Mounting Brackets for both the Brake and Throttle.

[cid:0cbe1120-106a-474c-bd89-8b78c1308040]

The email I received to confirm order #SSN4233 shows this screenshot below, which has no mention of the baseplate or U-Shaped Mounting Brackets, but does show the price with "black45" discount for all of those items.

  *
Baseplate-17-5: Baseplate
  *
U-Shaped Mounting Bracket for Brake
  *
U-Shaped Mounting Bracket for Throttle

Regards,
Scott.

Hi service@simsonn.com

Thank you for getting back to me. My order should also include the baseplate, but that isn't mentioned in your reply.

Can you confirm that is also being shipped as ordered please.

Regards,
Scott.

Hi service@simsonn.com,

This morning I received a parcel which contained the Simsonn Plus X pedal set and baseplate. It did not contain the VAM Pro Linear motors and power supply.

The original order email from Simsonn I received with tracking numbers:

[cid:a22413ac-f720-466a-9c2a-445960e264ad]

This is the first tracking number ALS01287279274, which is the parcel that arrived today 2025-12-30.

This is the second tracking number ALS01287252350, and I have not received this, I assume it contains the VAM Pro Linear Motors. The parcel tracking shows it has never left China.

[cid:7e1d25c2-7955-4aba-b1fd-943fdae92012]


  1.
Can I have an update on where this parcel is please.


  1.
Can you also advise when the Simsonn SQ Pro Racing Simulator Sequential Shifter (Extended) will be back in stock please.

Kind regards,
Scott.

Hi Simsonn,

I'm following up on this email as I have had no acknowledgement from Simsonn from my previous email.

I have not received the Simsonn VAM Pro Linear motors and brackets that I purchased a month ago. As below, I did receive the pedals and base plate.

Tracking number ALS01287252350 still shows no update since 8th December and has not been assigned an international tracking number. Can someone reply with information on when I will receive these items please.

Regards,
Scott.
